data.title: Emile Vandevelde by CAFFYN, W.H: Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - c.1910 - Signed lower right. W H Caffyn was an artist and illustrator whose work included the First World War poster 'Come along, boys! Enlist to-day'. This illustration was done for the publishers J M Dent. Emile Vandervelde (1866 - 1938) Belgian statesman, born at Ixelles. He studied law at the Free University of Brussels and became doctor of laws in 1885 and doctor of social science in 1888. Drawing, pencil and crayon 270 x 210 mm Fine condition - Emile Vandevelde
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

All major credit cards are accepted. Both UK pounds and US dollars (exchange rate to be agreed) accepted. Books may be returned within 14 days of purchase for any reason, but please notify first of returned goods.

Shipping Terms:

National and international delivery service is operational and unaffected by COVID-19. All shipped items are expertly packed and fully insured. All books to be sent by Recorded Delivery (UK) or signed-for Air Mail (overseas) service. UPS Express shipping also available. Packaging and insurance costs are included. Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
